about.title: About Us
about.text1: We provide eco-friendly transport rental services in your city. We offer hybrid cars, bicycles and e-scooters for short and long-term trips. Rental is simple and fast ‚Äî just pass a simplified document verification.
about.text2: Our mission is to make travel comfortable and accessible while reducing harmful emissions. By choosing our transport, you get freedom of movement and help keep the city cleaner. Together we create a city that is modern, mobile and nature-friendly.

reviews.title: Customer Reviews
reviews.subtitle: We care about the convenience and reliability of our service. Here's what those who have already used our rental say:

review1.name: Andriy Melnyk
review1.text: Rented a car for the weekend in Lviv ‚Äî everything was fast, transparent, and hassle-free. The car was clean and ready to go. Will definitely use it again!

review2.name: Maksym Nazarko
review2.text: Rented a scooter to get to work. No queues, card payment ‚Äî great. The scooter was charged and in good condition.

review3.name: Olena Koval
review3.text: Very convenient service! The scooter worked flawlessly, and support responded quickly to all questions.

review4.name: Ihor Shevchenko
review4.text: Great moped rental experience! Everything worked perfectly, and the price was pleasantly surprising.

popular_cards.fuel_saving: Fuel saving, perfect for the city

hero.subtitle: Join environmentally responsible mobility with us!
hero.text: We strive to make your transportation as convenient and eco-friendly as possible. By choosing electric transport for city trips, you make a conscious contribution to the future of our planet. It's not just about convenience and fuel cost savings, but also choosing clean air, city quietness, and preserving the environment for future generations.

post1.title: MistoGo helps the environment! 'Clean City' initiative
post1.description: We are proud that caring for the environment starts with real actions. That's why our team joined the 'Clean City' initiative and helps create a better Lviv!

post2.title: New cars in our fleet!
post2.description: Modern models with autopilot equipment have been added to our fleet. Technologies that once seemed like science fiction are now available for city trips. Join the innovation and care for the future.

post3.title: Simple. Profitable. For you.
post3.description: With each trip thanks to MistoGo, you not only become faster but also earn bonuses. More trips ‚Äî more benefits!

post4.title: Earth Day discount ‚Äî 20% off all services!
post4.description: To celebrate Earth Day, MistoGo is offering a 20% discount on all electric transport rentals on April 22nd.

support_page.title: Contacts / Support
support_page.contact_description: We are here to make your MistoGo experience comfortable. Leave a message or contact us directly ‚Äî we will respond as soon as possible.
support_page.form_description: Leave your request and our team will contact you soon.
support_page.form_consent: I consent to the processing of my personal data in accordance with the Privacy Policy. Your data is used only to contact you and is not shared with third parties.

q1.question: How can I rent electric transport through your website?
q1.answer: On our website, you can choose the transport you need from an interactive online map that shows the availability and location of electric scooters, electric cars, electric mopeds, and electric bikes. After selecting a vehicle ‚Äî confirm it and pay.

q2.question: How does the map with available transport work?
q2.answer: The map displays all available vehicles in real time. You can view their locations, choose the nearest or most convenient transport, and book it directly on the website.

q3.question: Where are the charging stations located?
q3.answer: The online map also shows charging stations, so you can easily find the nearest station to charge your electric transport.

q4.question: What to do if the electric transport runs out of battery?
q4.answer: If your transport runs out of battery, you need to go to the nearest charging station, which you can find on the map. Our company covers the cost of charging ‚Äî just notify us about the need to charge, and we will pay for it.

q5.question: How to pay for charging?
q5.answer: Payment for charging is made automatically or through our website/app, and the company pays for this service. You just need to follow the charging instructions at the station.

q6.question: How does the key system for cars work?
q6.answer: There is a box on the car that contains the key. To take it, you need to enter the password on the box. After completing the rental ‚Äî return the key to this box and close it. This ensures security and convenience.

q7.question: How to rent transport with a key?
q7.answer: During the rental, you receive a password for the key box. Take the key when you start the rental and return it to the box after completion. The entire process is automated for your convenience.

q8.question: How to pay for the rental?
q8.answer: After selecting the vehicle and confirming its condition ‚Äî pay for the rental online through a secure payment system.

q9.question: What to do if the transport is faulty or there is a problem?
q9.answer: Contact our support service using the contact information provided on the website, and we will help solve the problem.

q10.question: Can I rent transport for a long period?
q10.answer: Yes, we have the option to arrange long-term rental. More details are available in the Services section or by consulting with our manager.

section1.title: 1. General Provisions
section1.text1: Welcome to MistoGo! These Terms and Conditions (hereinafter - "Terms") govern your access and use of our website and services. By using our site, you agree to these Terms in full.
section1.text2: If you do not agree with any part of these Terms, please do not use our site and services.

section2.title: 2. Services
section2.text1: MistoGo provides vehicle rental services, including:
section2.text2: We reserve the right to change, suspend or discontinue any services at any time without prior notice.

section3.title: 3. Registration and Accounts
section3.text1: To use our services, you must create an account. When registering, you agree to:

list.item2: Maintain the security of your password
list.item3: Immediately notify us of any unauthorized use of your account
list.item4: Not transfer your account to other persons

section3.text2: You are responsible for all actions that occur under your account.

section4.title: 4. Vehicle Usage Rules
section4.text1: When using our vehicles, you agree to:

list.item2: Have a valid driver's license (for cars and mopeds)
list.item3: Not use vehicles under the influence of alcohol or drugs
list.item4: Return vehicles in designated parking zones
list.item5: Not transfer vehicles to third parties

section5.title: 5. Payment and Rates
section5.text1: Rental rates are set according to the price list published on the site. You agree to pay:

list.item2: Fines for violation of usage rules
list.item3: Cost of compensation for vehicle damage
list.item4: Traffic fines recorded during the rental

section5.text2: Payment is made through payment systems available on the site. All prices are indicated in hryvnias (UAH) or US dollars (USD).

section6.title: 6. Liability

list.item2: Any damage caused to vehicles during rental
list.item4: Loss or theft of vehicles due to your fault

section6.text2: MistoGo is not liable for any injuries, damages or losses incurred while using our services, except as provided by law.

section7.title: 7. Privacy
section7.text: We respect your privacy and protect your personal data in accordance with our Privacy Policy. By using our services, you agree to the processing of your personal data in accordance with this policy.

section8.title: 8. Intellectual Property
section8.text: All content on the MistoGo site, including text, graphics, logos, images and software, is the intellectual property of MistoGo or its partners and is protected by copyright laws.

section9.title: 9. Changes to Terms
section9.text: We reserve the right to change these Terms at any time. Changes take effect from the moment of their publication on the site. Continued use of our services after changes means your agreement to the new terms.

section10.title: 10. Contact Information
section10.text: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us:

section1.title: 1. General Provisions
section1.text1: MistoGo ("we", "us", "our company") respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal data. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store and protect your personal information.
section1.text2: By using our website and services, you agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy.

section2.title: 2. What Data We Collect
section2.text: We may collect and process the following categories of personal data:

list.item1: Identification data: name, surname, date of birth
list.item4: Payment data: payment card information (processed through secure payment gateways)
list.item5: Usage data: information about your trips, routes, rental time
list.item6: Technical data: IP address, browser type, operating system, cookies
list.item7: Location data: GPS coordinates during vehicle use

section3.title: 3. How We Use Your Data
section3.text: We use your personal data for the following purposes:

list.item5: Communication with you (booking confirmations, notifications, support)
list.item6: Improving our services and user experience
list.item9: Marketing and personalization of offers (with your consent)

section4.title: 4. Legal Basis for Data Processing
section4.text: In accordance with GDPR and Ukrainian Law "On Personal Data Protection", we process your data on the following legal grounds:

list.item1: Contract performance: to provide you with our services
list.item2: Consent: when you give explicit consent to data processing
list.item3: Legitimate interests: to prevent fraud and improve services

section5.title: 5. Disclosure of Information to Third Parties
section5.text: We may transfer your personal data to the following categories of recipients:

list.item3: Law enforcement agencies: in case of lawful request
list.item5: Partners: to provide additional services (with your consent)

section5.text2: We do not sell your personal data to third parties for their marketing purposes.

section6.title: 6. International Data Transfer
section6.text: Your personal data may be transferred and processed in other countries where our service providers are located. In such cases, we ensure an adequate level of data protection in accordance with GDPR through:

section7.title: 7. How We Protect Your Data
section7.text: We take appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data from unauthorized access, loss, destruction or alteration:

list.item2: Encryption of passwords and sensitive data in database
list.item4: Restriction of access to personal data

section8.title: 8. Data Retention Period
section8.text: We retain your personal data only for the period necessary to achieve the purposes for which it was collected:

list.item1: Account data: while your account is active
list.item3: Payment data: according to tax law requirements (5 years)

section8.text2: After the retention period expires, data will be deleted or anonymized.

section9.title: 9. Your Rights
section9.text: In accordance with GDPR and Ukrainian legislation, you have the following rights:

list.item1: Right to access: obtain a copy of your personal data
list.item2: Right to rectification: correct inaccurate or incomplete data
list.item3: Right to erasure: delete your personal data ("right to be forgotten")
list.item4: Right to restriction of processing: restrict processing of your data
list.item5: Right to data portability: receive data in a structured format
list.item6: Right to object: object to processing of your data
list.item7: Right to withdraw consent: withdraw consent to data processing
list.item8: Right to lodge a complaint: file a complaint with the Ukrainian Parliament Commissioner for Human Rights

section9.text2: To exercise your rights, contact us at: privacy@mistogo.com

section10.title: 10. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
section10.text: Our website uses cookies and similar technologies for:
section10.text2: You can manage cookies through your browser settings. Note that disabling cookies may affect website functionality.

section11.title: 11. Children
section11.text: Our services are not intended for persons under 18 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal data from children. If you believe we have inadvertently collected data from a child, please contact us immediately.

section12.title: 12. Changes to Privacy Policy
section12.text: We reserve the right to update this Privacy Policy. We will notify you of significant changes via email or site notifications. Continued use of our services after changes means your agreement to the updated policy.

section13.title: 13. Contact Information
section13.text: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or processing of your personal data, contact us:
